hero.blurb: Adopting water stewardship practices in your business

action_detail_block.title: Join the CEO Water Mandate
action_detail_block.content: \u003cp\u003eAs a UN Global Compact participant, you understand the critical need to ensure access to water and sanitation around the world. To help your business adopt better water stewardship practices, we invite you to join the CEO Water Mandate.\u003c/p\u003e\u003ch3\u003eHow the CEO Water Mandate can help your company\u003c/h3\u003e\u003cp\u003eThe CEO Water Mandate can assist you in developing, implementing and disclosing your water sustainability policies and practices. It will enable your company to share best and emerging practices and to forge multi-stakeholder partnerships to address water challenges found in river basins around the world. \u003c/p\u003e\u003ch3\u003eSix Core Elements of the CEO Water Mandate\u003c/h3\u003e\u003col\u003e\u003cli\u003eDirect Operations\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eSupply Chain and Watershed Management\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eCollective Action\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003ePublic Policy\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eCommunity Engagement\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eTransparency\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ol\u003e\u003cp\u003eEndorsing the CEO Water Mandate gives you the opportunity to contribute to the vision of the UN Global Compact and the realization of sustainable development. The Mandate is an initiative of the UN Global Compact – implemented in partnership with the Pacific Institute – and is a special programme of the UN Secretary-General.\u003c/p\u003e\u003ch3\u003eHow to join\u003c/h3\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eRequirements:\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003col\u003e\u003cli\u003eYour company must be a UN Global Compact participant or intend to become one within six months\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eYour CEO or equivalent must commit to the Mandate’s six core elements\u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eYou’ll need to report annually on progress toward these elements\u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ol\u003e\u003cp\u003eTo learn more about joining the CEO Water Mandate, \u003ca href="http://www.ceowatermandate.org/join-us"\u003evisit the CEO Water Mandate website\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e
